title: Project Vayne, Jhin, Vi
body: When are they coming out. I was so excited to come home from work to buy and play em and now they aint here :( when are they "officially" being released

replies.body: Typically the new skins take a day or so after the patch drops before they're added to the store. They should be added by friday!
From the Project: Hunters teaser they appeared to have a planned release of 11/12 though.
Oh look a skins tab.... 786 skins, ehh not bad... oh look, 3 more awesome skins coming? Gonna be 789 real soon...
